item.description:
Sorry for the late notice.

This is a great place with plenty of rolling hills and trails. One of our members is very familiar with the trails and will lead the group on a moderate to fast pace hike. Below is a link with a description of the area.

Please plan for 2 hours in the woods. Bring plenty of water and snacks for you and your pets.


http://www.town.duxbu...
item.how_to_find_us: Kate drives a blue Jeep Cherokee.
item.name: Knapp Town Forest - Duxbury
